FORMER.Definition: of an earlier time, but not now

BADASS.Definition: someone or something that you admire or find impressive

PREACHES.Definition: to try to persuade other people to believe in a particular belief or follow a particular way of life

PHILOSOPHY.Definition: theory and idea related to the understanding of a particular subject

ACCOUNTABILITY.Definition: being responsible for what you do and able to give a satisfactory reason for it

OVERCOME.Definition: to defeat or succeed in controlling or dealing with something

SPRINT.Definition: to run as fast as you can over a short distance, either in a race or because you are in a great hurry to get somewhere

TAKE TODAY OFF.Definition: take (some time) off; not at work; at home or on vacation

IMMEDIATE.Definition: happening or done without delay or very soon after something else

GRATIFICATION.Definition: pleasure or satisfaction, or something which provides this

DEROGATORY.Definition: showing strong disapproval and not showing respect

CONTEXT.Definition: the situation within which something exists or happens, and that can help explain it

SNOOZE.Definition: a button on an alarm clock (= a clock for waking you up) that makes the sound stop so that you can sleep for a few minutes more, before waking you up again

BULLSHIT.Definition: complete nonsense or something that is not true
